Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Munich and Dubrovnik, Munich and Paris, Dubrovnik and Helsinki, Helsinki and Paris, Munich and Helsinki, Bucharest and Paris, Munich and Prague, Paris and Prague, Bucharest and Munich, Helsinki and Prague, Bucharest and Prague.
